title: Songs From the Other Side of The Wall
description: 18 year-old Szandi is part of Budapestâ€™s vibrant, cosmopolitan art scene, sharing a flat and a bohemian lifestyle with her lover and fellow sculptress, Yang. Then a letter arrives that threatens everything, and forces her to choose once and for between the past and the present; between East and West; between her family and her lover.(Complete novel)
author: Dan Holloway
